snippet.title: Legend of Grimrock 2 Pre-order Trailer
snippet.description:
Pre-order NOW for a special discount of 15%:
http://www.grimrock.net

A group of prisoners have shipwrecked on the secluded Isle of Nex. You must overcome horrible monsters, mysterious puzzles and deadly traps devised by the ominous mastermind of the island. Are you ready to uncover the secrets of Nex?

Design, share and play custom scenarios with the included Dungeon Editor!

Like us on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/grimrockgame/

Follow us on Twitter:
http://www.twitter.com/almosthumanltd/
